participant_1.background:
My family members all have different jobs, but we all share a love for animals.
i was adopted when i was a baby.
I love my cats and badminton.
My favorite people are the ones who can appreciate my cooking.
My stamp collection was stolen when my house was broken into.

participant_2.background:
I wear comfortable clothing so I can feel my best while taking walks.
my mother is a ballet dancer.
I'm a tea enthusiast who loves spending time with my family and friends.
I pack my bags for the trip ahead of me.
i love the chainsmokers.

content.text: Hi participant_2! What do you like to do in your free time?
I love to cook! I love to experiment with new recipes and I love to share my food with my friends and family.
That's so cool! I'm not very good at cooking, but I love to eat! What's your favorite thing to cook?
My favorite thing to cook is probably my mom's chicken noodle soup. It's so comforting and delicious!
That sounds delicious! I love chicken noodle soup! My mom makes a mean one too.
That's awesome! Maybe we should trade recipes sometime!
That would be fun! I love to try new recipes.
Great! What are some of your favorite things to do in your free time?
I love to go for walks, spend time with my family and friends, and listen to music.
Those are all great things to do! I love taking walks too. What are some of your favorite places to go for walks?
I love to go for walks in the park, or just around my neighborhood. I also love to go hiking in the mountains.
Those sound like great places to go for walks! I'm not much of a hiker, but I do love going to the park.
That's cool! I'm glad you like to go for walks too. It's a great way to get some exercise and enjoy the outdoors.
I agree! It's also a great way to clear your head and relax.
Exactly! I love taking walks when I'm feeling stressed or overwhelmed.
Me too! It's a great way to de-stress.
Yeah! I'm glad we're both on the same page about walks.
Me too! I think they're one of the best things ever
